basic.blooming: Flowering period in spring, fruiting period in autumn
basic.color: Flower color yellow green, fruit color red

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients, pH value 6-7
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places, but also tolerates shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
